passive.name: Wager
passive.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer lands a CRIT hit on enemies, gains 1 stack of Good Fortune. This can stack up to {{3}} time(s). Every stack of Good Fortune increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. Good Fortune will be removed at the end of the wearer's turn.
